name: New user buying book from blinkbox books
description:
As a Guest user of blinkbox books
I want to the ability to complete register and buy book in one flow
So that I can read it

steps.name: I am on the home page

elements.name: First time user buying book and saving payment details

steps.name: I have identified a best selling book to buy
I register to proceed with purchase
I enter valid <card_type> card details
I enter valid Billing address
I choose to save payment details
I submit payment details
my payment is successful

elements.name: First time user buying book and not saving payment details

steps.name: I have identified a best selling book to buy
I register to proceed with purchase
I enter valid <card_type> card details
I enter valid Billing address
I choose not to save payment details
I submit payment details
my payment is successful

name: Returning buying book from blinkbox books
description:
As a returning user of blinkbox books
I want to the ability to sign in and buy a book
So that I can read it

steps.name: I have a stored card

elements.name: Returning logged in user buying book with saved payment card

steps.name: I have a stored card
I am buying a pay for book as a logged in user
I pay with saved default card
my payment is successful

elements.name: Returning user not logged in buying book with saved payment card

steps.name: I have a stored card
I am buying a pay for book as a not logged in user
I sign in to proceed with purchase
I pay with saved default card
my payment is successful

name: Manage personal details - change password
description:
As a singed in Blinkbox books user
I need the ability to update my
So I can keep my account up to date

steps.name: I am on the home page
I am on the home page
I have registered as new user without providing clubcard
I am on the Change your password section
I change password
I confirm changes
Your personal details page is displayed
I can sign in with the new password successfully

name: Update the Payment details of the user under 'your account'
description:
As a singed in Blinkbox books user
I need the ability to update my payment details
So I can keep my account up to date

steps.name: I am on the home page
I am on the home page
I have a stored card
I have signed in
I am on the Your payments tab
I delete the first card from the list
there are no cards in my account
"Your payment card has been deleted. You can add new cards to your account while making a purchase" message is displayed

arguments.val: Your payment card has been deleted. You can add new cards to your account while making a purchase

steps.name: I am on the home page
I have multiple stored cards
I have signed in
I am on the Your payments tab
I set a different card as my default card
"Credit card set as default successfully" message is displayed

arguments.val: Credit card set as default successfully

steps.name: the selected card is displayed as my default card

name: Register a new Blinkbox books user
description:
As a guest user of Blinkbox books
I want to sign up
So that I can buy and read books

steps.name: I am a guest user
I am a guest user
I am on the Sign in page
I click register button
Register page is displayed
I am a guest user
I am on Register page
I enter valid personal details
I choose a valid password
I accept terms and conditions
I submit registration details
Registration success page is displayed
welcome message is shown

name: Sign into Blinkbox books
description:
As a registered user of Blinkbox books
I want to sign in
So that I can access my account, read my library books and buy books

steps.name: I am not signed in
I am not signed in
I am on the Sign in page
I enter valid sign in details
I click sign in button
I am successfully signed in
I am redirected to Home page

name: Sign out from blinkbox books
description:
As a signed in user
I want to sign out from blinkbox books
So that I can prevent unauthorised access to my account

steps.name: I am on the home page
I have signed in
I am on the home page
I have signed in

at least 1 search result is shown

name: Suggestions for user search
description:
As a Blinkbox books user
I want to get suggestions when I start searching for a book or author etc
So that I can find quickly what I am looking for.

steps.name: I am on the home page

I type "spring" into search field
search suggestions should be displayed
